question: NFL: Will the Vikings beat the Steelers by more than 3.5 points in their December 9 matchup?
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for December 9:

If the Minnesota Vikings win by over 3.5 points, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Pittsburgh Steelers lose by less than 3.5 points or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by December 16, 2021, the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will a single person become Time's 2021 Person of the Year?
description:
This is a market on whether a single individual will be honoured Person of the Year by TIME's magazine for the year 2021.

Person of the Year (called Man of the Year or Woman of the Year until 1999) is an annual issue of the United States news magazine and website 'Time' that features and profiles a person, a group, an idea, or an object that "for better or for worse... has done the most to influence the events of the year.

If Time magazine names any single individual as 2021 Person of the Year, this market will resolve to "Yes". 

Otherwise, if multiple people, an organisation, a group, an idea or an object is honoured PoY, this market will resolve to "No".

Time's Person of the Year 2021 is picked by the newspaper's editors and is scheduled to be announced on December 13, 2021.

---------------------------

Those were the last 10 Persons of the Year:

2020 - Joe Biden and Kamala Harris
2019 - Greta Thunberg
2018 - The Guardians and the War on Truth
2017 - The Silence Breakers
2016 - Donald Trump
2015 - Angela Merkel
2014 - The Ebola Fighters
2013 - Pope Francis
2012 - President of the United States
2011 - The Protester

Read more about Person of the Year: https://time.com/poy

Take part in Time's poll "Who should be 2021 Person of the Year?": https://time.com/person-of-the-year-reader-poll-2021/

question: Will the floor price of CryptoPunks be above 55 ETH on December 23, 2021?
description:
This is a market on whether CryptoPunks will maintain a floor price of over 55 ETH on December 23, 2021 at 12:00 PM ET, according to https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks/forsale#.

This market will resolve to 'Yes' if on the aforementioned check time, there are no CryptoPunks listed for 55 ETH or lower on the official Larva Labs website, and 'No' otherwise.

Only listings that have existed for at least an hour are valid for this market (as verified by the transaction hash time).

question: Will a picture surface of Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson kissing before the end of the year?
description:
This is a market on whether the real picture of Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson kissing each other appears on the Internet before December 31 2021, 11:59:59 PM ET.

This market will resolve “Yes” if the credible news sources publish a real picture or footage with a clear mouth-to-mouth kiss between Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson before the resolution time, and "No" otherwise.

If they have kissed prior to the market creation date (December 9), but the picture or footage surfaces before the market resolution time, the market will still resolve to "Yes."

The Staged kiss for The Saturday Night Live from October does not count.

The resolution source for this market will be any credible news report or social media profiles of the aforementioned celebrities.

question: Will Joe Biden's approval rating be 41.5% or higher on January 6, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether Joe Biden's approval rating will be 41.5% or higher for the day of January 6, 2022. The resolution source will be FiveThirtyEight's approval rating poll aggregator, https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/biden-approval-rating/, specifically the approval rating indicated by the green trend line for the date of January 6, 2022. Changes in the methodology by which FiveThirtyEight calculates the approval rating will have no bearing on the resolution of this market. 

The resolution date for this market will be on January 7, 2022 at 12:00 PM ET according to data published for the day of January 6. The market will resolve to "Yes" if the approval rating for January 6 is 41.5% or higher, and "No" otherwise. If for any reason the resolution source is unavailable, the resolution source will be checked every 24 hours until the actual data is available. If the actual data is not available on the resolution source by January 14, 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50/50. If Joe Biden is not President on the resolution date, this market will resolve according to the most recent available approval rating.
